content: the snowy mountain ornament is an easy cute pattern suitable for the beginners you can hang a finished mountains on your christmas tree or make a year-around garland there are 2 sizes of the mountains in the pattern smaller is 7 cm high and the bigger is 10 cm high it´s not required to meet the established gauge you can use any kind of yarn but the size of the finished item will change accordingly the pattern is a great stash buster find me on instagram @thiscosynest
